formattedAddress: 60 Madison Ave #1004, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 Madison Ave #1004, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Tagliareni (and all the staff at PALS) are so incredibly good at helping families of children of special needs. As a clinician, I found Dr. Tagliareni brilliant, uniquely insightful, and always a professional. She took as much time with my sons (who have ASD) as they needed, scheduling extra sessions and observing them in their schools. When I needed her, she jumped to  testify at a hearing -- and was critical to my son's case for tuition reimbursement. Every time I talk to her, I feel like I learn more about my kids and feel more prepared to help them with whatever the next step is. I can't recommend her and PALS highly enough.
